About me

My name is Kai Sören Becker and I’m a 30 year old web-developer and android enthusiast from Wiesbaden. I’m working for //SEIBERT/MEDIA. In my spare time I enjoy taking photos, drawing and testing out new tech stuff, like:

  • Android custom roms and apps
  • web- & graphics design approaches
  • new linux distributions
  • smartphones & gadgets

If you have any questions, feel free to contact me via mail mail-at-kaisoerenbecker-punkt-de or via social network.
